title: Kaleidoscope salad
ingredients: ['300g (11 oz) fresh spinach, torn', '1/2 medium head red cabbage, shredded', '2 large carrots, sliced', '1 red pepper, chopped', '1 tablespoon balsamic vinegar', '2 tablespoons extra virgin olive oil', '30g (1 oz) pumpkin or sunflower seeds (optional)', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
